events.name: Battery Technology Development
events.wd_description: New advanced battery technologies are under development worldwide, such as solid-state batteries, sodium-ion batteries, lithium-sulphur batteries, and lithium-air batteries.
events.description: New advanced battery technologies are under development worldwide, such as solid-state batteries, sodium-ion batteries, lithium-sulphur batteries, and lithium-air batteries.

events.name: Dominance of Lithium-Ion Batteries
events.wd_description: Lithium-ion batteries will still be the dominant technology in use during the next decade.
events.description: Lithium-ion batteries will still be the dominant technology in use during the next decade.

events.name: Cobalt and Lithium Supply Chain
events.wd_description: The supply chain of cobalt and lithium is crucial for realizing battery technology.
events.description: The supply chain of cobalt and lithium is crucial for realizing battery technology.

events.name: Recycling Technologies
events.wd_description: Methods for recycling lithium-ion batteries including pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.
events.description: Methods for recycling lithium-ion batteries including pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.

events.name: Pyrometallurgy
events.wd_description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.
events.description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.

events.name: Hydrometallurgy
events.wd_description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.
events.description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.

events.name: Bioleaching
events.wd_description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals.
events.description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals.

events.name: Battery demand surge
events.wd_description: The demand for batteries is expected to increase dramatically in the short term as efforts to decarbonize all sectors intensify.
events.description: The demand for batteries is expected to increase dramatically in the short term as efforts to decarbonize all sectors intensify.

events.name: Potential material shortages due to battery demand surge
events.description: The dramatic increase in battery demand could result in shortages of critical materials such as cobalt and lithium in the coming years.
